Name: Sponsor Cents
Description: Every bit counts! Your small contribution helps NowShop continue improving and delivering better experiences for everyone. Thank you for your support!

Name: Sponsor Dollar
Description: Thank you for going the extra mile! Your sponsorship helps keep NowShop running smoothly and supports new features and community-driven growth.

Name: Netflix 1 Month Shared
Description: Unlimited worldwide streaming in stunning 4K Ultra HD with a premium shared account—enjoy your favorite shows and movies on any device for a full month.

Name: Netflix 3 Months Shared
Description: Unlimited worldwide streaming in stunning 4K Ultra HD with a premium shared account—enjoy your favorite shows and movies on any device for a full 3 months.

Name: Netflix 12 Months Shared
Description: Unlimited worldwide streaming in stunning 4K Ultra HD with a premium shared account—enjoy your favorite shows and movies on any device for a full 12 months.

Name: Disney 12 Months Shared
Description: Enjoy 12 months of unlimited streaming on Disney+ in stunning 4K Ultra HD. Access a shared premium account and watch your favorite Disney, Marvel, Star Wars, and Pixar content on any device worldwide.

Name: Youtube 12 Months Individual
Description: Enjoy 12 months of unlimited streaming on Disney+ in stunning 4K Ultra HD. Access a shared premium account and watch your favorite Disney, Marvel, Star Wars, and Pixar content on any device worldwide.

Name: HBO Max 12 Months Shared
Description: Stream blockbuster movies, HBO originals, and hit series in stunning 4K Ultra HD with a premium shared HBO Max account. Enjoy 12 months of unlimited entertainment on all your favorite devices.

Name: Apple TV 24 Months Shared
Description: Enjoy 24 months of premium Apple TV+ streaming with a shared account. Watch award-winning originals, hit movies, and exclusive series in brilliant 4K on all your Apple and non-Apple devices.

Name: Prime 6 Months Individual
Description: Access 6 months of Amazon Prime Video with an individual account. Stream a wide selection of blockbuster films, hit series, and exclusive originals in HD or 4K on any device.

Name: Spotify 12 Months Individual
Description: Get 12 months of uninterrupted Spotify Premium. Enjoy ad-free music, unlimited skips, and high-quality audio streaming across all your devices anytime, anywhere.
